resume.description: I'm currently a Product Manager @PontoTel, a company focused on HR and with a mission to improve the experience with time and attendance control and people management. I have more than 4 years of expirience in building digital products and I'm used to work in the whole process, from the problem understanding/solution conception to the product delivery.

pontotel.desc_1: I've started at PontoTel as a software develeoper intern and after 6 months I became a software engineer there. During this time i've lead lots of projects, including new products and system integrations.
pontotel.desc_2: Nowadays I work as Product Manager, helping in the roadpmap definition and working through the whole process of the product life, helping the product team in the product discovery and delivery.
